actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Recreation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Recreation

official_title: A bill to specifically permit trapping in the Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, subject to such reasonable rules and regulations as may be prescribed.

summary.text: Permits trapping in accordance with applicable Federal and State laws in the Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, subject to such reasonable rules and regulations as may be prescribed.

titles.title: A bill to specifically permit trapping in the Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, subject to such reasonable rules and regulations as may be prescribed.
